before.description:
Unix timestamp in milliseconds. Returns only transactions created before the specified date.
Provides an explicit end time. If not provided, default value will be applied, and may change over time. 
The current default value is the past 90 days.

after.description:
Unix timestamp in milliseconds. Returns only transactions created after the specified date.
Provides an explicit start time. If not provided, default value will be applied, and may change over time. 
The current default value is the past 90 days.

status.description:
The primary status of the transaction. 
For details, see [Primary transaction statuses](https://developers.fireblocks.com/reference/primary-transaction-statuses)

orderBy.description:
The field to order the results by

**Note**: Ordering by a field that is not createdAt may result with transactions that receive updates as you request the next or previous pages of results, resulting with missing those transactions.

sort.description: The direction to order the results by

limit.description: Limits the number of results. If not provided, a limit of 200 will be used. The maximum allowed limit is 500

sourceType.description: The source type of the transaction

sourceId.description: The source ID of the transaction

destType.description: The destination type of the transaction

destId.description: The destination ID of the transaction

assets.description: A list of assets to filter by, seperated by commas

txHash.description: Returns only results with a specified txHash

sourceWalletId.description: Returns only results where the source is a specific end user wallet

destWalletId.description: Returns only results where the destination is a specific end user wallet
